metadata.title: RA Family: What design problem does this kit solves?

sections.content:
Question:
What design problem does this kit solves?
Answer:
This is the complete reference solution with easy & fast integration of AI/ML technology at the edge application with RA MCU.
Enabling single to multimodal AI/ML application development
Providing flexibility of sensor selections and combinations
Acceleration of the development, faster GTM
Enables BOM analysis and optimization
Comparable between multiple Renesas' AI/ML partner solutions
Suitable Products
AIK-RA6M3
AIK-RA4E1
